name: Wild Dino-saur Hunt-ing Survival Pixel
description: Beautiful GIGANTIC pixel world game with an open world game play. Explore the epic pixel island by dinosaur hunting or explore the survival arena of the deep almost endless lava filled mine caves. Be the dino pixel survival hunter you always dreamed of. This awesome dino hunter game has cool lakes and waterfalls. A wonderful looking place if you like fps dinosaur simulator games. If your into deer hunting, duck hunt or any survival craft games or even pixel building games, were sure you will enjoy our environment and game play in this dinosaur hunting safari game. Be the last dino survivor and enjoy your dino hunt!
